#summary Converting from SEQUOIA to moltk

= Introduction =

We intend for SEQUOIA users to have an easy time learning to use moltk.  Use the following guide to using moltk.

= Conversions =

|| *Sequoia command* || Corresponding moltk command || Comment ||
|| {{{% sequoia}}} || {{{% python -i}}} <br> {{{from moltk import *}}} || start an alignment session ||
